import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function Form1() { const [data, setData] =useState([]); useEffect(() =>{ axios.get('http://localhost:8081/') .then(res =>console.log(res)) .catch(err => console.log(err)); }, []) return (
{data.map((food, index )=>{ return })}
id Name price description type image
{food.id} {food.name} {food.price} {food.description} {food.type} {food.image}
) } export default Form1
